## netgrep package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Netgrep](./netgrep.netgrep.md) | The <code>netgrep</code> library allows to search remote files for a specific pattern using the <code>ripgrep</code> library over HTTP. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BatchNetgrepResult](./netgrep.batchnetgrepresult.md) | Type representing a <code>NetgrepResult</code> for a batch search. |
|  [NetgrepConfig](./netgrep.netgrepconfig.md) | The global Netgrep configuration object. |
|  [NetgrepInput](./netgrep.netgrepinput.md) | Type representing a single search target in a batch search. The <code>T</code> generic is for the metadata that will be returned back in the result object. |
|  [NetgrepResult](./netgrep.netgrepresult.md) | A result object returned for a search. The <code>T</code> generic represents the metadata passed in the search method used. |
|  [NetgrepSearchConfig](./netgrep.netgrepsearchconfig.md) | The optional configuration passed in a single search method. |
